data.name: XDockableWindowListener
desc: makes it possible to receive docking events.

methods.name: closed
desc: is invoked when the window was actively closed

methods.name: docking
desc: is invoked during the docking procedure when the window has been moved.
on return the DockingData must contain either the old tracking rectangle or a changed rectangle if required, additionally it must indicate if the window should be docked or floating
Note: the tracking rectangle indicates to the user where the window would be placed if he releases the mouse.

methods.name: endDocking
desc: is invoked when the docking procedure ends.
aWindowRect contains the new position and size of the window

methods.name: endPopupMode
desc: is invoked when the window currently is in pop-up mode and wants to be undocked or closed

methods.name: prepareToggleFloatingMode
desc: is invoked when the floating mode is about to be changed between floating and docked or vice versa
if returned FALSE the floating mode will not be changed

methods.name: startDocking
desc: is invoked when the docking procedure starts.

methods.name: toggleFloatingMode
desc: is invoked when the floating mode is changed between floating and docked or vice versa
